'''20w20b''' is the seventeenth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.16]], released on May 14, 2020,<ref name="20w20b">{{snap|20w20b|May 14, 2020}}</ref> which fixes some bugs.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=20w20b
|;old
|44936|Extending a potion effect that you already have can cause the timer to display wrong.
|134057|Recipe book preferences don't save.
|145102|"--server" client launch argument may crash the client on the loading screen.
|;dev
|172737|Crafting table menu forgets 'show crafting' setting.
|176755|Server logs error on start: Unable to bootstrap registry 'minecraft:chunk_generator_type'.
|;prev
|183769|NPE in server initialization.
}}</onlyinclude>

{{slicedlime|GU-2lyDd7Kc}}

== Trivia ==
* This snapshot was released on [[slicedlime]]'s 40th birthday.
* This is the last version of Minecraft that uses the old Mojang logo from 2013 (first is [[13w47a]]).
* This snapshot changed the main class of the server from net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer to net.minecraft.server.Main .
